flawed_nl_solution:
Santana has 1 + 1 + 2 = <<1+1+2=2>>2 brothers with birthdays in the second half of the year.
She has 7 brothers - 2 brothers = <<7-2=5>>5 brothers with birthdays in the first half of the year.
Altogether, she has to buy 2 + 7 = <<2+7=9>>9 presents in the second half of the year.
Therefore, she has to buy 9 - 5 = <<9-5=4>>4 more presents in the second half of the year.
#### 4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 2. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
